body_html:
I recently added a change that may help in this case, though I'm not certain. I increased the threshold for how large a buffer needs to be before it's quantized, from 16 up to 1024. I also made it a configurable parameter:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms/quantize_weights.cc#L40

This isn't in a release yet, but if you build the latest TensorFlow from source you can give it a try.

body:
I recently added a change that may help in this case, though I'm not certain. I increased the threshold for how large a buffer needs to be before it's quantized, from 16 up to 1024. I also made it a configurable parameter:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms/quantize_weights.cc#L40

This isn't in a release yet, but if you build the latest TensorFlow from source you can give it a try.
